records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02_cr.description: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.
records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02_cr.skillDisplayName: Greater Scroll of the Crushing Vortex

records_skills_spirit_enslavespirit.dbr.description: Slip through the barriers of your enemies' consciousness and dominate their mind, binding them to your will.  While enslaved your enemy will be forced to obey your commands but eventually they will regain control of their mind and turn against you.  Ineffective against monsters five or more levels above you.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_n_ga.description: Smites your foes with three powerful jets of freezing water.

properties.offensiveFumble: 50% Chance to Fumble attacks for 3.0 Second(s)

records_skills_nature_pet_naturepetdodge.description: Even the sturdiest armor has its chinks.  The best way to stay alive is to not get hit.

records_skills_defensive_adrenaline_defe.description: Increases damage and attack speed during an adrenaline rush.

records_skills_defensive_weaponpool_disa.description: A fighting technique that utilizes the shield to crush foes and throw them off-balance.

records_xpack_skills_dream_tranceofempat.description: Force enemies to share the damage they inflict upon you by forming a telepathic link to their minds that conveys only pain and siphons life in retribution.

properties.offensiveLifeLeech: 3 ~ 10% of Attack damage converted to Health

records_skills_nature_sylvannymphsummons.description: Summons a powerful forest Nymph who can bring down enemies with her magical bow and cast enchantments to strengthen allies in battle.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_01_el.description: Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.

records_skills_defensive_adrenaline.dbr.description: Each enemy hit has a chance of triggering an adrenaline rush that boosts life regeneration.

records_skills_warfare_warhorn_doomhorn..description: Your War Horn heralds the doom of your enemies, shattering their nerves and reducing their ability to defend themselves.

records_skills_hunting_weaponskill_volle.description: A combat technique that uses the spear or bow to rapidly strike three times in succession.

records_skills_hunting_artofthehunt_trai.description: Grants those who follow the hunt endurance to relentlessly track their quarry, preventing even the most tangled thicket from slowing pursuit.

records_skills_nature_wolf_petmodifer_su.description: An instinctual will to live is triggered whenever health is low.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03x_m.description: Summons the avatar of a mad god.  Although control can only be maintained for a short while, the god can wreak havoc in even this short time span.
records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03x_m.skillDisplayName: Divine Scroll of the Maddened God

records_xpack_skills_dream_luciddream.db.description: Increased conscious control over your dream state enhances abilities that derive power from the dream world.

records_xpack_skills_dream_nightmare_pet.description: The mesmerizing stare of the Nightmare is able to dominate lesser minds and throw them into a state of confusion, causing them to wander aimlessly and attack phantom images.

records_skills_earth_volcanicorb_fragmen.description: Causes the Volcanic Orb to violently explode on impact sending out fragments of rock that each inflict physical damage to the enemies they hit.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02_un.description: Grants an aura which improves both the armor and attack strength of the caster and their allies.
records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02_un.skillDisplayName: Greater Scroll of the Unbreakable Alliance

records_xpack_skills_dream_phantomstrike.description: Vanish from the waking world and reappear  before a target enemy to deliver a monstrous attack.

records_skills_defensive_armorhandling.d.description: Understanding how to properly adjust and move in armor allows you to wear heavier armor and shields than an untrained warrior of equivalent strength could manage.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02x_e.description: Sends shockwaves of force through the surrounding ground, damaging and stunning any nearby enemies.

records_skills_earth_flamesurge_flamearc.description: Increases the damage and number of flame jets created by Flame Surge.

records_skills_storm_iceshard_velocity.d.description: Increasing the speed and damage of Ice Shard. Gives each shard a chance to punch through its target and keep going.

records_skills_spirit_wraithlord_petmodi.description: Drawing upon ancient arcane craft the Liche King forms deadly bolts of elemental energy and launches them at enemies.

records_skills_hunting_herbalism.dbr.description: Living off the land, you learn to identify and utilize medicinal plants to create healing salves.  When applied it will fortify against poison and healing is accelerated for a duration.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_da.description: Blankets the area around you with scorching flames that hurt only enemies.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03_br.description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.

records_skills_warfare_dualweapontrainin.description: Learn to effectively wield two weapons.

records_skills_spirit_darkcovenant.dbr.description: Mysterious otherworldly entities offer great power to Spirit Masters who can commune with them.  The cost, however, is measured in life.

records_skills_nature_sylvannymph_petski.description: Imbues the Nymph's attacks with the power of the elements.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03_cr.description: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.
records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03_cr.skillDisplayName: Divine Scroll of the Crushing Vortex

records_skills_spirit_spiritward_spiritb.description: Adds damage against undead to the attacks of those under the effects of Spirit Ward.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_pets_.description: Also includes their main phys dmg

records_skills_defensive_colossusform.db.description: Assume the form of a towering Colossus and lay waste to your enemies.

records_skills_nature_sylvannymph_petmod.description: Allows the Nymph to create a living shield around allies that absorbs damage and harms enemies that strike it.

records_skills_defensive_concussiveblow..description: Adds a chance for attacks to stun enemies and increases the duration of stun attacks when wielding a club or axe.

records_skills_stealth_poisongasbomb.dbr.description: Lobs a bomb that will burst on impact releasing a cloud of toxic gas that damages enemies and impairs their attacks.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03_un.description: Grants an aura which improves both the armor and attack strength of the caster and their allies.
records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03_un.skillDisplayName: Divine Scroll of the Unbreakable Alliance

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_da.description: Sends forth a wave of sonic energy which stuns and damages all enemies in its path.

properties.offensiveManaBurn: 4000% Energy Drained (200% Energy Drained Causes Damage)

records_xpack_skills_dream_nightmare_pet.description: The Nightmare is able to speak to the minds of your other minions and coordinate their attacks, making them more effective in combat.

records_skills_nature_sylvannymph_petmod.description: Imbues the Nymph's attacks with the power of the elements.

records_skills_stealth_calculatedstrike_.description: Uncommonly good fortune provides a chance that calculated strikes will slip past enemy armor causing tremendous damage.

records_skills_stealth_envenomweapon.dbr.description: Coats your weapons with deadly poison while activated.

records_skills_spirit_pet_etherlord_dire.description: Strikes with otherworldly energy that has the power to sear an enemy's spirit from the very fabric of reality.

records_skills_nature_heartofoak_tranqui.description: Provides a chance to use skills at 50% reduced energy cost while under the effect of Heart of Oak.

records_skills_nature_heartofoak_permane.description: Protects allies from the elements, reducing the damage caused by elemental based attacks.

records_skills_warfare_battlestandard_pe.description: Seeing the inevitability of your triumph, enemies lose hope and the strength of their attack diminishes.

records_xpack_skills_dream_luciddream_pr.description: A precognitive sense of the imminent future allows you to stay one step ahead of your enemies in combat.

records_skills_nature_briarward.dbr.description: A protective grove of briars grows around you that enemies cannot pass through.

records_skills_stealth_flashpowder.dbr.description: A magician's trick turned to more nefarious purposes, flash powder blinds adjacent enemies impairing their ability to hit with weapons and potentially disorienting them.

records_skills_defensive_adrenaline_resi.description: Increases how often an Adrenaline rush can be triggered.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03x_b.description: Summons an enormous demonic beast from the netherworld.

records_xpack_skills_dream_tranceofwrath.description: Waves of negative psionic energy emanate from the player, disrupting enemy thoughts and burning through their physical being.

records_skills_nature_regrowth.dbr.description: A wave of healing energy rapidly restores lost life to the target ally.

records_skills_hunting_woodlore.dbr.description: Central to survival in the wilderness is the ability to hunt with bow and spear.  Great familiarity with these weapons allows you to wield them with exceptional speed and precision.

records_skills_defensive_battleawareness.description: Focus allows you and your allies to react quickly to enemy attacks increasing the chance of a successful shield block.

records_skills_earth_coredweller_petmodi.description: Allows the Core Dweller to ignite an area of ground causing severe burn damage to enemies within.

records_skills_stealth_anatomy.dbr.description: With a deep knowledge of anatomy, attacks can be directed at vital points in the body increasing the chance and effectiveness of bleed damage.

records_skills_stealth_stealthmastery.db.description: Provides the physical conditioning and secret knowledge necessary to train as a rogue.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03x_m.description: Turns the inner power of surrounding enemies against them, burning their bodies with the power of their own magic.

properties.offensiveManaBurn: 30% Energy Drained (200% Energy Drained Causes Damage)

records_skills_storm_energyshield_reflec.description: Gives Energy Shield the ability to reflect a portion of enemy attack damage back at enemies who hit it.

records_skills_hunting_studyprey_flushou.description: Draw your enemies into the open, making them more vulnerable to attack.

records_xpack_skills_equipment_skills_so.description: A blast of energy that crushes the spirit of all surrounding enemies.

properties.offensiveManaBurn: 10% Energy Drained

records_skills_earth_heatshield.dbr.description: Casts a protective heat shield on the target that absorbs damage caused by fire.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_n_ga.description: A wave of pure darkness will blast outward from the player's feet to wound all enemies in the vicinity.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_e_da.description: Attempts to drain the soul of an enemy, doing enough damage to kill all but the strongest foes and delivering their health to the player.

properties.offensiveLifeLeech: 500% of Attack damage converted to Health

records_skills_item_skills_thunderclap.d.description: Releases an electrical ring of energy that stuns enemies within its radius.

records_skills_hunting_ensnare_barbednet.description: Barbed hooks on the hunter's Ensnare net tear into enemies as they struggle causing them to bleed.

records_xpack_skills_equipment_skills_cr.description: Cries of impending doom possess enemies with terror

records_xpack_skills_dream_dreammastery..description: Expand your consciousness to draw more deeply from the power of the dream realm and exert your will upon physical reality.

records_skills_defensive_rally.dbr.description: The resolute call of your horn can turn the tide of battle, inspiring all in its range to fight with renewed vitality.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03_el.description: Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.

records_skills_earth_stoneformbuffself.d.description: An impervious layer of rock envelops you for a short duration boosting regeneration but prohibiting movement.

records_skills_earth_stoneform_moltenroc.description: Adds retaliation fire damage to Stone Form.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_01x_a.description: Opens a conduit of pure energy that flows from the celestial planes into the caster, granting them improved control over their mystical powers.

records_skills_warfare_battlestandard_pe.description: Throw down a mighty standard to embolden the hearts of nearby allies.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_pets_.description: A wave of force is projected outward that forms chaotic ripples in the fabric of reality and delivers devastating damage to the body and mind of enemies.

records_skills_storm_stormnimbus.dbr.description: When active, the player is imbued with the power of the storm, causing their attacks to strike with cold and lightning damage.

records_skills_spirit_lifedrain_cascade..description: Causes Life Drain to blast through the primary target and hit multiple enemies.

records_skills_earth_flamesurge.dbr.description: Three jets of flame erupt from the caster's hands each inflicting incinerating fire damage to enemies.

records_skills_hunting_marksmanship_punc.description: Incorporating a more streamlined shaft into your arrows allows them to pass through targets and hit additional enemies in their path.

records_skills_nature_briarward_sanctuar.description: The power of the grove revitalizes those within and reduces the energy consumed by skill use.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_01_cr.description: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.

records_skills_storm_stormsurge.dbr.description: When activated, each enemy hit has a chance of unleashing a violent squall of storm energy.

records_skills_spirit_ternion_arcanelore.description: The magic practitioners of older civilizations devised many insidious techniques to bolster the destructive capabilities of their magical staves.  Knowledge of these methods will unlock the true power of your staff attacks.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_01_fr.description: Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.

records_skills_storm_stormwisp_petmodifi.description: A wisp ability that increases elemental damage of all nearby allies for a duration and provides protection from lightning and cold damage.

records_skills_spirit_deathchillaura_rav.description: Accelerates the effects of time on adjacent enemies' equipment causing weapons to dull and armor to crumble.

records_skills_hunting_marksmanship_scat.description: A secret of master fletchers is the ability to craft special arrow heads that burst on impact sending out razor-sharp fragments in all directions.  Each shard delivers piercing damage to the enemies it hits.

records_skills_warfare_battlerage_counte.description: Provides a chance to counter attack an enemy after being hit in Battle Rage.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02_fr.description: Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.

records_skills_nature_wolf_petskill_maul.description: A gnawing attack that rends enemy flesh causing bleed damage for a short duration.

records_xpack_skills_dream_tranceofconva.description: A restful state of mind causes increased life recovery and damage absorption for the player and allies.

records_skills_storm_spellbreaker_spells.description: Inflicts energy burn damage and disrupts enemy spell-casters' ability to use skills as their beneficial enchantments are abruptly shattered by Spell Breaker.

records_skills_nature_plague_fatigue.dbr.description: Saps the strength from diseased enemies causing them to move more slowly and fight less effectively.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_01_un.description: Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.

records_skills_spirit_wraithlord_petskil.description: Drawing upon ancient arcane craft the Liche King forms deadly bolts of elemental energy and launches them at enemies.

records_skills_stealth_lethalstrike_mort.description: Stuns victims of Lethal Strike and greatly magnifies the impact of poison and bleeding damage caused by the attack.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03x_a.description: Grants the caster improved reflexes, allowing them to dodge most incoming projectiles.

records_skills_storm_squall.dbr.description: Creates a wind storm in the target area that decreases the projectile attack accuracy of enemies caught within it.

records_skills_earth_volatility.dbr.description: Enhanced by the volatile energy of the Earth, your fire attacks have a chance of inflicting greatly increased damage.

records_skills_nature_briarward_petmodif.description: Causes enemies who hit the Briar Ward to suffer poisoning.

records_skills_hunting_artofthehunt_find.description: Making use of available cover as you press your attack allows you to avoid unnecessary damage.

records_skills_stealth_laytrap.dbr.description: Drops a mechanical bolt trap that will trip when enemies draw near and rapidly fire out deadly bolts.

records_skills_warfare_battlerage.dbr.description: Each enemy hit has a chance of sending you into a battle rage that adds bonus damage to attacks and increases Offensive Ability for a short duration.

records_skills_hunting_takedown.dbr.description: A brutal thrust from your spear delivers devastating piercing damage to enemies and diminishes a portion of your enemy's total life.

records_skills_earth_coredweller_petmodi.description: Increases the Core Dweller's speed and adds fire damage to its attacks.

records_skills_stealth_throwingknife_flu.description: Learn to throw additional knives at once and cut down enemies with a lethal flurry of razor-sharp metal.

records_skills_storm_iceshard_torrent.db.description: Increases the number of shards cast, sending a deadly torrent at enemies.

records_skills_nature_briarward_petskill.description: Causes enemies who hit the Briar Ward to suffer poisoning.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02x_v.description: Lays down a field of vampiric energy.  The life force of any enemies who cross into this field will be ripped from their souls and transferred to the caster.

records_skills_nature_regrowth_dissemina.description: Causes regrowth energy to disseminate from the initial target and leap to additional nearby allies.

records_skills_defensive_weaponpool_shie.description: A shield fighting technique that inflicts damage with both the weapon and the shield.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_pets_.description: Three jets of flame erupt from the caster's hands each inflicting incinerating fire damage to enemies.

records_skills_nature_naturemastery.dbr.description: Grants the inner harmony and patience necessary to learn the language of wild creatures and master the hidden power of nature.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_e_da.description: Move with divine grace for a short duration, becoming almost impossible to hit.

records_skills_storm_stormwispsummoning..description: Summon an immortal Storm Wisp from the atmosphere to battle your enemies.

records_skills_storm_pet_staticnova.dbr.description: When activated, each enemy hit has a chance of unleashing a violent squall of storm energy.

records_xpack_skills_dream_psionictouch_.description: Psionic energy within the target ignites and explodes outward, burning through their material being and inflicting severe damage to adjacent targets.

records_skills_nature_renewal.dbr.description: Subtracts time from recharging skills allowing you to use them more frequently.

records_skills_warfare_ancestralhorn.dbr.description: The ominous call on this ancient heirloom will summon forth ghostly heroes of old from the Elysian Fields to do battle once more.

records_skills_hunting_huntingmastery.db.description: Imparts the predatory spirit and cunning necessary to learn the arts of hunting.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_01_st.description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.

records_skills_spirit_deathchillaura.dbr.description: A deathly chill radiates from the character slowing the attack and movement of enemies as it diminishes their life.

records_skills_nature_wolf_petmodifer_ma.description: A gnawing attack that rends enemy flesh causing bleed damage for a short duration.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_pets_.description: When active, the player is imbued with the power of the storm, causing their attacks to strike with cold and lightning damage.

records_skills_defensive_battleawareness.description: Grants allies the resolve to hold out against great adversity.

records_skills_earth_coredweller_petmodi.description: Under tremendous heat and pressure, the composition of the Core Dweller hardens making it more resistant to damage.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_ga.description: Raw elemental forces of fire and ice are invoked, colliding with each other in an explosion of terrific power.

records_skills_spirit_ternion.dbr.description: This powerful wizard's trick causes your staff to shoot three projectiles by channeling magical energy into it.  Initially each hit is not as powerful as a normal attack but the effectiveness increases every level.

records_skills_stealth_envenomweapon_neu.description: Oils harvested from deadly Nightshade plants give your Envenomed Weapons the ability to slow enemies.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_e_ga.description: Makes the blood boil within the veins of all nearby opponents, wounding them and magically replenishing the player's own life at the same time.

properties.offensiveLifeLeech: 100% of Attack damage converted to Health

records_xpack_skills_dream_distortionfie.description: A field of psionic power bends the fabric of reality around the player, negating some of the damage from enemy attacks and dealing retaliatory damage to enemies that strike you.

records_skills_stealth_envenomweapon_del.description: Adds a chance for poison to cloud an enemy's mind, sending them into a state of confusion.

records_skills_defensive_quickrecovery.d.description: A strong shield arm allows you to block multiple attackers with amazing speed when necessary but it can only be kept up for a short time.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_e_da.description: Restores the player and all nearby allies to full health.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03x_a.description: Rips the very fabric of the universe asunder, devastating all who enter its area of influence.

records_skills_stealth_pet_bolttrap_defa.description: Drops a mechanical bolt trap that will trip when enemies draw near and rapidly fire out deadly bolts.

records_skills_hunting_studyprey.dbr.description: By observing your prey from a distance you may discover its weakness, resulting in greater pierce damage.

records_skills_spirit_wraithlordsummons..description: In ages past, powerful sorcerers learned how to cheat Hades and persist as undead liches long after death had robbed their bodies of life.  A dangerous practice of Theurgists is to bind the souls of these ancient liches to their will, thus acquiring their powers.

records_skills_warfare_warhorn.dbr.description: The triumphant call of your war horn temporarily stuns enemies.

records_skills_spirit_outsidersummons.db.description: Calls forth a powerful extra-dimensional entity from beyond the ether.  The link can only be maintained for a short time.

records_skills_storm_stormmastery.dbr.description: Provides the mental control and spiritual focus to unfetter your mind of earthly concerns and learn to harness the elemental power of weather.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_pets_.description: Causes electricity to leap from the target of your Lightning Bolt skill and strike additional nearby enemies.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_ga.description: Shakes the ground and sends a shockwave of disturbed earth toward your foe.

records_xpack_skills_dream_pet_nightmare.description: Sends out a powerful ripple of distortion around the player that tears the fabric of reality, causing severe damage to enemies caught within it.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_01x_w.description: Inspires the caster, greatly improving their offensive capabilities in melee combat.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03x_a.description: Grants the caster improved control over their inner powers, allowing them to use their skills more quickly and more effectively.
records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03x_a.skillDisplayName: Divine Scroll of the Archmage's Fury

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02_st.description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.

records_skills_defensive_batter.dbr.description: A shield attack that hits for increased damage and slows enemies' attacks for a duration.

records_skills_nature_briarward_petskill.description: Causes thorns to sprout from your Briar Ward that will damage enemies that hit it.

records_skills_warfare_onslaught_hamstri.description: An attack aimed at the enemy's legs reduces their ability to run and increases their vulnerability for a short duration.

records_xpack_skills_equipment_skills_pe.description: A wave of soothing relief that washes over enemies temporarily rendering them unconscious.

records_skills_spirit_spiritward.dbr.description: Casts a protective ward that will reduce the damage of undead attacks on the player and nearby allies.

records_skills_earth_fireenchantment_sto.description: Tempers armor, increasing protection and fire resistance while under the effects of Earth Enchantment.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_01x_s.description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.

records_skills_storm_energyshield.dbr.description: Creates a shield of energy that will nullify all incoming damage from elemental attacks.

records_skills_hunting_artofthehunt.dbr.description: Hunting experience gives you the edge when facing familiar quarry such as Animals and Beastmen.

records_skills_warfare_battlerage_crushi.description: Provides a chance for attacks to cause bonus damage while in Battle Rage.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_01x_v.description: Lays down a field of vampiric energy.  The life force of any enemies who cross into this field will be ripped from their souls and transferred to the caster.

records_skills_defensive_shieldcharge_di.description: Increases the shock effect of Shield Charge, startling adjacent enemies and disrupting skill use for a time.

records_skills_item_skills_charge.dbr.description: Charges the target and executes an attack inflicting bonus damage.

records_skills_stealth_disarmtraps.dbr.description: Expertise with traps and magical devices allows the Rogue to easily disable them and avoid their damage.

records_xpack_skills_dream_distortionwav.description: Amplifies the physical distortion effect, causing it to shatter armor and break bones.

records_skills_stealth_openwound.dbr.description: Adds a chance that weapon attacks will inflict bleeding damage when using a sword, spear, bow, or axe.

records_skills_hunting_ensnare.dbr.description: Casts a weighted net around the feet of an enemy holding them in place but not preventing them from attacking if you are within their range.

records_xpack_skills_dream_distortionwav.description: Psionic energies ignite into a surge of electrical power that causes horrific burning over a short duration.

records_skills_earth_fireenchantment_bri.description: Boosts the physical damage of attacks and provides a chance of causing critical fire damage while under the effects of Earth Enchantment.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02x_n.description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.

records_skills_nature_regrowth_accelerat.description: Allows Regrowth to be cast more frequently.

records_skills_spirit_deathward.dbr.description: Places a magical ward on the player that protects them from death by granting additional life when their life gets dangerously low.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03_fr.description: Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_e_da.description: Trap a large group of monsters with the power of the sea god.
Quickly restores the player to full health and energy.

records_skills_stealth_laytrap_rapidcons.description: Expertise in assembling traps reduces the amount of time it takes to create a new trap after one has been set.

records_skills_earth_coredweller_petskil.description: Allows the Core Dweller to ignite an area of ground causing severe burn damage to enemies within.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02_un.description: Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_01_br.description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.

records_skills_nature_plague_susceptibil.description: Weakens the constitution of adjacent enemies making them more susceptible to physical and elemental damage.

records_skills_earth_ringofflame.dbr.description: Encircles you in a searing ring of flames burning all enemies that come within its radius.

records_skills_nature_plague.dbr.description: Plague afflicts nearby enemies with a debilitating ailment that reduces their health and quickly spreads to other nearby creatures.

records_skills_warfare_dualwieldtechniqu.description: A Dual Wield technique that hits up to 3 adjacent enemies.

records_skills_storm_lightningbolt.dbr.description: Calls down a powerful bolt of lightning from the heavens to decimate your target.

records_skills_defensive_shieldcharge.db.description: A running attack that slams into the enemy with your shield causing bonus damage and stunning them.

records_skills_stealth_laytrap_petmodifi.description: Modifications to the Bolt Trap increase the number of bolts fired per round.

records_skills_spirit_darkcovenant_unear.description: Draw upon even greater otherworldly powers to augment yourself and allies in battle, but be wary of the cost exacted from your own vitality.

records_xpack_skills_dream_luciddream_te.description: A subtle acceleration of time around the player allows them to move more quickly, anticipate attacks, and negate the slowing effects of enemy skills.

records_skills_hunting_takedown_eviscera.description: Targeting vital weak-points on your enemy causes sustained damage from bleeding.

records_skills_spirit_deathchillaura_nec.description: Weakens the constitution of adjacent enemies making them more susceptible to attacks that directly damage their life such as vitality damage and life leeching.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03_un.description: Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_da.description: Steals the energy of all enemies in the vicinity, harming them for every bit of energy stolen.

properties.offensiveManaBurn: 8000% Energy Drained (200% Energy Drained Causes Damage)

records_xpack_skills_dream_psionictouch..description: Psionic energies focused within your weapons will create a bone shattering resonance when they contact your enemies. {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.

records_skills_storm_stormnimbus_staticc.description: Electrical energy builds inside the player while Storm Nimbus is active and passes through enemy weapons that come in contact, delivering a powerful shock.

records_skills_spirit_lifedrain.dbr.description: Leeches life from an enemy to replenish your own.

records_skills_warfare_battlestandard_pe.description: Seeing the inevitability of your triumph, enemies lose hope and the strength of their attack diminishes.

records_skills_hunting_callofthehunt_cun.description: Take full advantage of your enemy's mistakes and vulnerable moments to inflict savage wounds.

records_skills_storm_thunderball_concuss.description: Enhances the power of Thunderball causing sparks to leap from the initial explosion.  Each spark that hits an enemy inflicts lightning damage and stuns.

records_skills_storm_freezingblast.dbr.description: Encases enemies in ice, immobilizing them but also making them more difficult to damage.

records_skills_earth_ringofflame_softenm.description: Intense heat from the Ring of Flame softens the metal of enemy armor and weapons, decreasing their effectiveness.

records_skills_nature_heartofoak.dbr.description: Bolsters the life-force of yourself and nearby allies.

records_skills_spirit_wraithlord_petskil.description: Casts a bolt of spectral energy that depletes life from any living thing it touches.

records_skills_defensive_battleawareness.description: Enter a state of heightened awareness that allows you and your nearby allies to perceive and respond to attacks more effectively.

records_xpack_skills_equipment_skills_sn.description: ProjectileRing - shoots out several lobbed aoe balls

records_skills_storm_squall_obscuredvisi.description: Reduced visibility inside the Squall makes it difficult for enemies to effectively attack or defend themselves.

records_skills_storm_iceshard.dbr.description: Projects a deadly shard of ice at the target inflicting cold damage and temporarily slowing them.

records_skills_spirit_visionofdeath.dbr.description: Assaults the minds of surrounding enemies with images of their own death causing the weak-hearted to flee in horror and more resolute foes to fight less effectively.

records_skills_nature_wolf_petmodifier_s.description: The howl of your wolves emboldens the hearts of those who hear it causing them to fight more fiercely.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_da.description: Makes the player and all allies immune to elemental damage and ranged weaponry for a duration.

records_skills_stealth_lethalstrike.dbr.description: A single deadly hit that multiplies the damage of a normal weapon attack.

records_skills_spirit_wraithlord_petskil.description: Allows the Liche King to create an explosion of negative energy that damages enemy's constitution making them more susceptible to all forms of damage.

records_skills_stealth_bladehoning.dbr.description: While active, this skill ensures that the blades on the swords or spears of yourself and allies will remain razor sharp and inflict increased piercing damage.

records_skills_earth_eruption.dbr.description: Volcanic fissures form in the ground, emitting deadly geysers of molten flame and fiery chunks of brimstone.  Each fragment inflicts physical and fire damage to the enemies it hits.

records_skills_warfare_dualwieldtechniqu.description: A Dual Wield technique that causes increased damage by 50%.

records_skills_earth_earthmastery.dbr.description: Trains your mind and spirit in ancient techniques that will enable you to draw power from the Earth and gain mastery over rock and fire.

records_skills_storm_lightningbolt_chain.description: Causes electricity to leap from the target of your Lightning Bolt skill and strike additional nearby enemies.

records_skills_storm_thunderball.dbr.description: Hurls a ball of electrical energy that damages and stuns enemies in a small blast radius.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02_br.description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.

records_skills_warfare_warwind.dbr.description: Executes a devastating spinning attack that can damage up to four enemies.  Initially each hit is not as powerful as a normal attack but the effectiveness increases every level.

records_skills_defensive_rally_defiance..description: A percentage of all damage inflicted by enemies will be revisited back upon them for a short duration after using Rally.

records_skills_warfare_onslaught_ardor.d.description: You build momentum as you drive your attack forward, attacking and moving more rapidly.

records_skills_warfare_onslaught.dbr.description: When used as your default weapon attack, Onslaught charges up as you hit enemies causing increased damage for up to twice the original damage bonus. The first hit adds a charge equivalent to the first level of the skill and it continues to charge until it reaches your current skill level. Onslaught dissipates rapidly when not actively attacking.  {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.

records_skills_defensive_rally_inspirati.description: Gradually restores lost energy to allies allowing them to continue the fight.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_pets_.description: Calls down a powerful bolt of lightning from the heavens to decimate your target.

records_skills_earth_coredweller_innates.description: Adds a chance for attacks to stun enemies and increases the duration of stun attacks when wielding a club or axe.

records_skills_earth_pet_coredwellerskil.description: Provokes enemies to draw their attention away from allies.

records_xpack_skills_dream_distortrealit.description: Enhances the power of the distortion ripple, unleashing a surge of psionic energy that causes massive damage to enemies and temporarily freezes them in time.

records_skills_spirit_pet_spiritward_le_.description: Summons a totem that holds a powerful spirit, infusing you and all allies with great mental energy while standing close to it.

records_skills_stealth_throwingknife.dbr.description: Throw a piercing blade at your opponent capable of causing prolonged bleeding.

records_skills_earth_flamesurge_barrage..description: Reduces the recharge time of Flame Surge allowing it to be cast more frequently and efficiently.

records_skills_item_skills_ringofflame_f.description: Encircles you in a searing ring of flames burning all enemies that come within its radius.

records_skills_warfare_onslaught_ignorep.description: Total focus in the heat of battle allows you to ignore physical and piercing damage.

records_skills_hunting_callofthehunt.dbr.description: Those who answer the call of the hunt will fight with increased speed and cunning.

records_xpack_skills_dream_phantomstrike.description: Devastate your enemies and steal their power by ripping the very dreams from their minds.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_01x_c.description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.

records_skills_spirit_spiritmastery.dbr.description: Provides the arcane knowledge and mental discipline to study the dark art of controlling spirits.

records_skills_warfare_warfaremastery.db.description: Provides physical conditioning and discipline that will allow your character to master the skills of a warrior.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02_el.description: Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.

records_skills_defensive_weaponpool_pulv.description: A fighting technique that utilizes the shield to slam into enemies, knocking them senseless.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_e_ga.description: Sends forth a barrage of lightning bolts to strike your foes.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_ga.description: A protective barrier appears around the player, reflecting enemies' spells back at them for a duration.

records_xpack_skills_dream_nightmare_pet.description: The mesmerizing stare of the Nightmare is able to dominate lesser minds and throw them into a state of confusion, causing them to wander aimlessly and attack phantom images.

records_skills_warfare_dualwieldtechniqu.description: A Dual Wield technique that can hit up to 2 enemies with a cross-cutting scissor motion.

records_skills_defensive_batter_rendarmo.description: Increases the effectiveness of Batter causing it to hit three targets with enough force to dent their armor.

records_skills_nature_wolfsummons.dbr.description: Summons a wolf companion to fight with you in battle.  At higher levels more wolves can be controlled at once.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_da.description: Invokes a storm cloud above the player--even indoors--which will rain down bolts of Zeus' lightning upon all enemies.

records_skills_stealth_toxindistillation.description: Learn alchemical processes to distill natural toxins, increasing the potency and duration of all poison attacks.

records_xpack_skills_dream_sandsofsleep..description: Puts enemies to sleep, rendering them immobile for a duration or until awakened by an attack.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_e_da.description: Bloodfire tears of the god Ares rain down upon the Earth, causing bleeding and fire damage on all who are struck.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_e_ga.description: Let loose a mighty roar, greatly bolstering the combat skills of the player and nearby allies for a short time.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_da.description: Makes the player completely invulnerable to all forms of damage for a short duration.

records_xpack_skills_dream_distortrealit.description: Sends out a powerful ripple of distortion around the player that tears the fabric of reality, causing severe damage to enemies caught within it.

records_skills_storm_spellbreaker.dbr.description: A pulse of negatively charged energy dispels hostile enchantments on allies or, when cast on enemies, breaks their beneficial enchantments and negates a portion of their energy.  This attack inflicts bonus damage when used against Magical creatures.

records_skills_storm_pet_zap.dbr.description: Scalds enemies with a blast of elemental energy.

records_skills_warfare_dodge_attack.dbr.description: Even the sturdiest armor has its chinks.  The best way to stay alive is to not get hit.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_da.description: A cloud of dark dreams spreads out from the player, putting all enemies to sleep.  When they awaken, they will be filled with confusion, terror, and lethargy.

records_xpack_skills_dream_distortionwav.description: A wave of force is projected outward that forms chaotic ripples in the fabric of reality and delivers devastating damage to the body and mind of enemies.

records_skills_spirit_wraithlord_petmodi.description: Allows the Liche King to diminish its corporeal presence making it less vulnerable to all types of damage.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02x_v.description: Lashes out in fiery retaliation each time the caster is struck by a melee attack.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_e_da.description: Builds up the melee power of the player to epic proportions.

records_skills_earth_coredweller.dbr.description: Draws forth a powerful elemental guardian from the Earth's fiery depths.

records_skills_hunting_marksmanship.dbr.description: Marksmanship skill allows you to create and fire arrows that fly faster and increase pierce damage.  {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.

records_skills_stealth_poisongasbomb_shr.description: Packed with volatile liquid and metal scraps, the Poison Gas Bomb will explode violently on impact showering the area with deadly Shrapnel.  Each fragment of shrapnel inflicts piercing damage to the enemies it hits.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_e_ga.description: Poisoned darts fire outward from the player in all directions.

records_xpack_skills_equipment_skills_li.description: A concentrated blast of poison that eradicates pesky enemies.

records_skills_spirit_circleofpower.dbr.description: Summons a totem that holds a powerful spirit, infusing you and all allies with great mental energy while standing close to it.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_e_ga.description: Calls down flaming meteorites from the sky above.

records_skills_defensive_defensivemaster.description: Provides the fortitude and strength to master skills for the protection of yourself and others.

records_xpack_skills_dream_nightmare.dbr.description: Calls forth a nightmarish phantasm from the dream world to serve as your familiar.

records_skills_warfare_battlestandard.db.description: Throw down a mighty standard to embolden the hearts of nearby allies.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03_st.description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.
